alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 1:23PM CST until January 14 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Mobile AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Monroe, Wilcox and Clarke Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 43.0 feet, Access to Eureka Landing community stops, with access cut off. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 29.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage early Thursday afternoon to 42.8 feet early Friday afternoon. It will rise to 43.1 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
